Name: Japanese Maple
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of mist with aromatic bitters .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: This excellent Japanese whisky-based sour is balanced with maple syrup.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009 by Damian Windsor at The Roger Room , Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Japanese Maple contains 184 calories
